video.title: Saving Grace
video.synopsis: Following a car crash, a self-destructive detective gets a chance at redemption from her "last chance angel," but she has difficulty accepting it.

episodes.synopsis: Detective Grace Hanadarko meets her last-chance angel, Earl, after killing a man while driving drunk, then investigates the case of a missing child.
episodes.title: In the Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Grace and the cops look into the murder of oilman Bo Grady and discover that one of the witnesses is the estranged brother of Lt. Yukon.
episodes.title: Bring It On, Earl

episodes.synopsis: Grace and the cops pursue a murder suspect who has claimed sanctuary in a church and also meet Capt. Perry, the new head of the Major Crimes Division.
episodes.title: Bless Me, Father, for I Have Sinned

episodes.synopsis: After a Christian teenager is attacked before he's scheduled to testify in a murder trial, he moves in with Grace for protection.
episodes.title: Keep Your Damn Wings Off My Nephew

episodes.synopsis: Grace's favorite aunt comes to town and reveals some shocking news, and Grace investigates the theft of a statue owned by cattle tycoon Alvin Green.
episodes.title: Would You Want Me To Tell You?

episodes.synopsis: The murder of an alleged call girl leads Grace to question a notorious Oklahoma crime family. Ham's wife suspects Ham is having an affair with Grace.
episodes.title: And You Wonder Why I Lie

episodes.synopsis: Grace and the cops investigate the murder of a war veteran whose body was found burned as part of a Native American ritual.
episodes.title: Yeehaw, Geepaw

episodes.synopsis: Grace pursues a street gang an officer is killed while serving a warrant. Leon is devastated when his ex-wife asks if her fiancé can adopt their son.
episodes.title: Everything's Got a Shelf Life

episodes.synopsis: The cops look into the murder of a young woman, and Grace becomes obsessed with solving the case. Earl tells Grace that God has a plan for her.
episodes.title: A Language of Angels

episodes.synopsis: After a deadly school bus accident, the cops learn about a recall on the bus. Death row inmate Leon Cooley makes a turn in his religious journey.
episodes.title: It's Better When I Can See You

episodes.synopsis: While trying to rob a diner with a wooden gun, a man with Down Syndrome gets killed. Grace begins dating her neighbor's son, Jack, who is an atheist.
episodes.title: This Is Way Too Normal for You

episodes.synopsis: In preparation for a murder trial, a brash defense attorney digs into the personal lives of Grace and the other detectives in the squad.
episodes.title: Is There a Scarlet Letter on My Breast?

episodes.synopsis: Rhetta tries to make sense of the items Earl has left behind for Grace and discovers the shocking truth that forces Grace to face her painful past.
episodes.title: Tacos, Tulips, Ducks and Spices

episodes.synopsis: Grace is praised and scrutinized for her role in a pursuit through the crowded streets of downtown Oklahoma City, during which a fugitive is captured.
episodes.title: Have a Seat, Earl

episodes.synopsis: Grace investigates the disappearance of an athlete, which leads to a man Grace befriended after his father was killed in the Oklahoma City bombing.
episodes.title: A Survivor Lives Here

episodes.synopsis: Grace and the cops investigate the professional hit on an OCPD employee, who is murdered right under their noses in the men's bathroom at Louie's.
episodes.title: A Little Hometown Love

episodes.synopsis: Grace suspects a teenage girl is involved with her mother's disappearance. Clay disobeys his father by joining a police youth organization.
episodes.title: It's a Fierce, White-Hot, Mighty Love

episodes.synopsis: After a traffic accident reveals over $200,000 in cash hidden inside her car, Grace investigates and uncovers a long-dormant, unsolved murder.
episodes.title: Do You Love Him?

episodes.synopsis: Grace and the cops search for a man who killed his wife and set his 6-year-old son on fire. Ham tries to cope with the loss of his brother.
episodes.title: Are You an Indian Princess?

episodes.synopsis: The murder of an illegal immigrant leads Grace into the worlds of Oklahoma politics and racist skinheads.
episodes.title: You Are My Partner

episodes.synopsis: As the cops investigate a series of grisly murders across Oklahoma City, they begin to suspect the slayings are the work of a serial killer.
episodes.title: The Heart of a Cop

episodes.synopsis: After a girl dies at a teen prescription-drug party attended by Grace's niece, the cops investigate a counterfeit drugs distribution ring.
episodes.title: Do You Believe in Second Chances?

episodes.synopsis: After talking to her former partner, Grace wonders why Abby was promoted.
episodes.title: Take Me Somewhere, Earl

episodes.synopsis: The cops investigate the death of a woman who was the lover of a famous architect who practices Tantric sex.
episodes.title: The Live Ones

episodes.synopsis: Grace discovers that Doug is having a romance with Maggie, a waitress at Louie's, and becomes concerned about how serious the relationship is.
episodes.title: But There's Clay

episodes.synopsis: Grace becomes suspicious after Maggie claims that she was attacked and threatened by a stranger.
episodes.title: So What's the Purpose of a Platypus?

episodes.synopsis: Grace and Rhetta are involved in a mysterious shooting in a convenience store.
episodes.title: I Believe in Angels

episodes.synopsis: Grace tracks down and confronts the mysterious girl Earl revealed to her in a dream, and the encounter leads her to a group of violent extremists.
episodes.title: We're Already Here

episodes.synopsis: Grace investigates an alcohol recovery group after one of its members is murdered. Rhetta learns about her family's dire financial situation.
episodes.title: She's a Lump

episodes.synopsis: Mourning the loss of her family's farm, Rhetta searches for a time capsule that she and Grace buried on the property when they were 10 years old.
episodes.title: Watch Siggybaby Bum

episodes.synopsis: Another last-chance angel crosses paths with Earl and takes an interest in Grace. The cops investigate a death in an apparent botched home invasion.
episodes.title: What Would You Do?

episodes.synopsis: Grace struggles to communicate with the mystery coma girl after she awakens. Ham wants to help Amanda cope with the loss of Rafe.
episodes.title: Mooooo

episodes.synopsis: The MCU races to find Grace after she disappears while investigating a difficult rape case, as Earl does some searching of his own.
episodes.title: Am I Going to Lose Her?

episodes.synopsis: A 99-year-old man's murder leads Grace and the detectives to a vice operation. Earl gives Grace a big piece of the Coma Girl puzzle.
episodes.title: That Was No First Kiss

episodes.synopsis: When Grace's informant tips her to a dead body, the MCU investigates an increasingly strange case. Rhetta wonders whether she can trust her husband.
episodes.title: Popcorn

episodes.synopsis: A parole officer's murder leaves the MCU with a long list of suspects. Grace gets information on Neely from a surprising source.
episodes.title: Looks Like a Lesbian Attack to Me

episodes.synopsis: Grace and the MCU investigate a robbery at a collector's home. Earl tasks Grace with finding Neely. Rhetta gives her husband Ronnie an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Am I Gonna Die Today?

episodes.synopsis: After surviving a 12-story fall, Grace decides to speak to God; a mysterious stranger may have something to do with Earl's dire warning.
episodes.title: Let's Talk

episodes.synopsis: Grace struggles with her grandfather's impending death, and the squad investigates a double homicide. Rhetta discovers a secret about her daughter.
episodes.title: Hear the Birds

episodes.synopsis: Grace reunites with a childhood friend who is in jail for murdering her husband. The squad works to track down a missing person with brain damage.
episodes.title: You Can't Save Them All, Grace

episodes.synopsis: Grace gets to see a new side of her nephew when a rock band is related to the murder case. Rhetta continues where she left off with Ronnie.
episodes.title: I Killed Kristin

episodes.synopsis: Grace answers for herself and her character to God.
episodes.title: So Help You God

episodes.synopsis: Grace investigates the death of a cowboy, and Father Johnny helps Rhetta and Ronnie communicate.
episodes.title: Loose Men in Tight Jeans

episodes.synopsis: Grace must cope with survivor's guilt after killing a little girl in a car accident. Capt. Perry has an announcement; the squad investigates a murder.
episodes.title: You Think I'm Gonna Eat My Gun?

episodes.synopsis: Grace isolates herself from family and friends while she continues to struggle with her tragic event.
episodes.title: I Need You to Call Earl

episodes.synopsis: After experiencing a spiritual upheaval, Grace returns to Oklahoma City with a new sense of purpose.
episodes.title: I'm Gonna Need a Big Night Light
